fulltext:
HOANG NAM NGUYEN 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
Mitsui & Co. Vietnam  
Food & Beverage department, in charge of Coffee and Instant Coffee 
      Nov 2017 – Present 
 
Functioning just like a representative office. 
 
Participate in bidding with multinationals, national exporters. 
 
Perform market research, crop survey, data collection & analysis to get understanding about various aspects of local 
industries to assist Head office in identifying strategic direction and objectives in local origin. 
 
Assist to build up the supply channel of instant coffee with Tín Nghĩa, Intimex groups, Tata coffee, Outspan coffee, 
Ngon coffee (TTC group) 
 
Other administrative tasks: contract following, price fixation, cupping evaluation. 
HAPROSIMEXJSC, Vietnam                                                                                                      
Sale department (Mainly Coffee trading)  
                May 2014 - Sep 2017 
 
Conducted fundamental research and technical analysis that have effect on trend of both local basis price and ICE 
futures 
 
Created cost table to generate the price targets with break even point and the margins to work on it for FOB. 
 
Approached trading houses to make the sales and undergoing with local suppliers, collectors to purchase, maintain 
the relationship with them. Got insight to many coffee supply chain levels. 
 
Other administrative tasks: contract following, price fixation. (My first year trading: 4,000 MTS, after my leave company 
also stop coffee business) 
 
Also experienced on sales of Pepper and Cashew. 
Thanh Tri Garment JSC, Vietnam                                                                                                          
Logistics department                                                                                                                      May 2013 – Mar 2014 
 
Responsibility of controlling and monitoring all Customs matters. 
 
Traffic the import of textile material and export of finished good 
EDUCATION  
Troy University - Business and Management                                                       
Bachelor of Business Administration 
 
Relevant Coursework: Finance, Financial Market and Institutions, international trade 
 
Major: International trade. Minor: Finance 
LEADERSHIP EXPERIENCE    
Six thinking hats project 
Executive Vice President of Operations                                                                                           April 2011 - Nov 2011 
 
A small campaign to connect all students inside university and help them improve their soft skills. 
 
Increased student enrollment in the organization by 31.6% 
 
Promoted weekly meetings as well as volunteer projects, workshops, and informational sessions and coordinated 
events 
LANGUAGES, SKILLS & INTERESTS 
 
Languages: English (Fluent), Vietnamese (Native) 
 
Skills: Microsoft Words/Excel/PowerPoint, Bloomberg Terminal and experienced to some other financial data 
provided by brokers or Vietnamese financial institution (a study on my own interests) 
 
Other interests: football, travelling, reading

educations.major: Quản lý đô thị và công trình

experiences.detail:
Functioning just like a representative office.
Participate in bidding with multinationals, national exporters.
Perform market research, crop survey, data collection & analysis to get understanding about various aspects of local industries to assist Head office in identifying strategic direction and objectives in local origin.
Assist to build up the supply channel of instant coffee with Tín Nghĩa, Intimex groups, Tata coffee, Outspan coffee,
Ngon coffee (TTC group)
Other administrative tasks: contract following, price fixation, cupping evaluation.

Conducted fundamental research and technical analysis that have effect on trend of both local basis price and ICE futures
Created cost table to generate the price targets with break even point and the margins to work on it for FOB. Approached trading houses to make the sales and undergoing with local suppliers, collectors to purchase, maintain the relationship with them. Got insight to many coffee supply chain levels.
Other administrative tasks: contract following, price fixation. (My first year trading: 4,000 MTS, after my leave company also stop coffee business)
Also experienced on sales of Pepper and Cashew.

Responsibility of controlling and monitoring all Customs matters.
Traffic the import of textile material and export of finished good

A small campaign to connect all students inside university and help them improve their soft skills.
Increased student enrollment in the organization by 31.6% Promoted weekly meetings as well as volunteer projects, workshops, and informational sessions and coordinated events
